name: Urbanero
description: Urbanero is a platform for participatory urban development and collective decision-making. The project has come about as part of the research for master thesis looking at design best practices for citizen participation smartphone apps.

name: City Designer
description: Site curating information about design challenges posed by a modern urban environment. The long-term ambition is to create a learning platform for engaging the public on how to design better cities for everyone, by everyone.

name: Web Crash Course
description: Intensive web development workshops for beginners. The idea is to get a person who has never seen code to publish their website on GitHub Pages in a single 4-hour sitting. The focus is on shipping rather than nuts and bolts of web development. The project is currently work in progress.

name: Take Me To Denmark
description: I initially used the domain to get accepted to a university in Denmark. Now the site serves as a source of information for people who are interested in studying in Denmark. Frontpage uses various APIs to fetch weather, news and concerts from Denmark.
